Package game

Class AttackBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.AttackBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
public class AttackBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behaviour
A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
Author:
ram, Chantelle Loh, Gan

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AttackBehaviour​(ZombieCapability attackableTeam)
    Constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Action getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns an ZombieAttackAction that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • AttackBehaviour

      public AttackBehaviour​(ZombieCapability attackableTeam)
      Constructor. Sets the team (i.e. ZombieCapability) that the owner of this Behaviour is allowed to attack.
      Parameters:
      attackableTeam - Team descriptor for ZombieActors that can be attacked

  • Method Details

    • getAction

      public Action getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an ZombieAttackAction that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor. Actors are attackable if their ZombieCapability matches the "undeadness status" set
      Specified by:
      getAction in interface Behaviour
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor involved as the owner of this Behaviour
      map - The map the actor is on.
      Returns:
      an Action that actor can perform, or null if actor can't do this.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor parameter is a null
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if map parameter is a null
      See Also:
      Behaviour.getAction(Actor, GameMap)
